pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: Eddie Quillan Collection of Scripts for Radio Programs
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Majority of the scripts are from The Eddie Cantor Show, 1944-1949, Time to Smile, 1942-1944 with gaps, and Wednesday With You, 1945. Most scripts are annotated by Quillan. Note: Some of the same scripts may be in the Manning Ostroff Collection.
